amendment.description: At the end of subtitle G of title XII, on page 842, after line 14, insert the following section: SEC. 1268. REPEAL OF AUTHORIZATION FOR THE USE OF MILITARY FORCE. The Authorization for Use of Military Force Against Iraq Resolution of 2002 (Public Law 107-243; 50 U.S.C. 1541 note) is repealed.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 424 printed in Part B of House Report 116-143 to repeal the Authorization for Use of Military Force Against Iraq Resolution of 2002.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lee (CA) amendment (A049) Agreed to by recorded vote: 242 - 180 (Roll no. 464).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lee (CA) amendment (A049) Agreed to by recorded vote: 242 - 180 (Roll no. 464).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A049) offered by Ms. Lee (CA).
